_Formulas with Operations Prescribed_ are described within the `{forks}` package, __/f…îrks/__, which helps to extend and vectorize the base R `formula` class.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `forks` from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

```{r}
#install.packages("forks")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("asshah4/forks")
```

## Usage

The `forks` package is simple, and only has several major functions.
